description: Advances from a small village to a bustling town, ready to expand rapidly. Kush Workers garther grain 10% faster, archers gain 1 ranges are 10% more accurate and shot 5% faster.
tooltip: Advance to Town Phase, which unlocks more entities and technologies.  Civic Centers +25% territory influence radius, 25% more garrison capacity and +5 range. Structures +2 capture points regeneration rate per garrisoned unit.  Workers 10% faster farming. Archers shoot 5% faster and 10% more accurate and + 1 range.
